price: Whoever does righteous deeds while he is a believer, his efforts will not be denied[40], for We are recording them all.
arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَلَا كُفۡرَانَ لِسَعۡيِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ كَٰتِبُونَ
footnotes: [40] i.e., He will not be deprived of his due reward.
